page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: There is only one school in Lapford, and that is our primary school.It is fifty years old, as it was opened in 1935.There was a school before that, built in 1860, and it is now used for the playgroup and the youthclub.We have 75 children in three classes. We come to school when we are 5, and leave at 11.Our classrooms are large with lots of windows.We have three classrooms, a dinningroom, a staffroom and a library.Outside there are two playgrounds, a big playing field, gardens lawns and a swimming pool.Some children come each day by minibus.When we leave we go to secondary schools at Chulmleigh or Crediton, each about eight miles away.
